name: fx-autorefresh-on-demand-devel
title: Auto-Refresh on Demand
description: Automatically refreshes pages, optionally only if they have changed.
author: Ondřej Hošek

preferences.name: softRefreshMinutes
preferences.title: Soft refresh interval
preferences.description: How often (in minutes) to check if the page changed, and refresh it if it did.

preferences.name: hardRefreshMinutes
preferences.title: Hard refresh interval
preferences.description: How often (in minutes) to refresh the page, whether it has changed or not.
